Welcome.  Glad to have you join in.  Hope you have fun.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Great post! Glad to have you aboard.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "MiChAeL CoBuRn" <impa_shadowsage@h...> 
> wrote:
> > Hey, I'm new to this RPG, I love Transformers stuff, I know my As 
> and Ds, Ms 
> > and Ps.  I read some previous posts, and, really, a Transformer's 
> RPG is 
> > cool!!!  Tell me how this is for a first post and new character.
> > 
> 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> ~~~
> > [Ganthrax]
> > 
> > Ganthrax was settling down by a lake, watching the night stars. 
> The 
> water 
> > glimmered from the moonlight.  Ganthrax's dark body could only be 
> seen by 
> > his glowing red optics.  He walked up to the edge of the lake, 
and 
> looked at 
> > his reflection.  He thought to himself, Earth was wonderful.  
> Marvelous.  
> > Ganthrax went over by some trees, and went to sleep, his red 
optics 
> getting 
> > dimmer and dimmer.  So much beauty, so many things to see, so 
many 
> bots to 
> > kill.  Yes, Earth was wondeful.
> > 
> > (Did I do okay?  Did I do anyth
